info.name: Trasealla Beauty Center CRM
info.description:
Complete API collection for Trasealla Beauty Center CRM Backend.

## Authentication
- Login with `POST /api/auth/login` to get a Bearer token
- The token is auto-saved to `{{token}}` variable
- All protected routes use `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

## Multi-Tenancy
- The `tenant_id` is embedded in the JWT token
- Super admin routes use a separate token `{{super_admin_token}}`

## Demo Credentials
- **Tenant Admin**: username=`admin`, password=`Trasealla123`
- **Super Admin**: username=`trasealla_admin`, password=`Trasealla@2025!`
